All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Comunicator
Comunicator is an utility class to perform high-level I/O.
Menu
The base class for all menus.
Option
Indicates that an annotated method is a menu option, such methods are used to define an action to be performed when the given option is chose.
Terminal
Terminal is the abstract class that provides an abstraction layer for the I/O system, it's implemented using the singleton design pattern since it's a shared resource.
Title
The title of a menu to be displayed.
Validator<T>
A validator to validate user input.
